WhySuppliers.title: Why Suppliers Love Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop
WhySuppliers.description: All the benefits that come with selling on pernia’s are designed to help you sell more, and make it easier to grow your business.

cardList.title: 0 Penalty Charges
cardList.descreption: Sell online without the fear of order cancellation charges with 0 penalty for late dispatch or order cancellations.

cardList.title: 0% Commission Fee
cardList.descreption: Suppliers selling on pernia’s keep 100% of their profit by not paying any commission

cardList.title: Ease f Doind Business
descreptionList: 7-Day Payment Cycle from the delivery date

cardList.title: Growth for Every Supplier
cardList.descreption: From small to large and unbranded to branded, all suppliers have grown their businesses on pernia’s.

ExclusiveSupplier.title: Exclusive Supplier+ Rewards for the first 30 days

cardList.title: Free Catalog Visibility of 1200
cardList.descreption: Run advertisements for your catalogs to increase the visibility of your products and get more orders

cardList.title: Dedicated Catalog Manager
cardList.descreption: Clear all your cataloging doubts ike how to upload catalogs, correct quality check errors and more

cardList.title: Free Return Shipping
cardList.descreption: Send out your orders stress-free with zero fees on return shipping for the first month

cardList.title: No Order Cancellation Charges
cardList.descreption: Cancel orders that you can’t fulfill for unforeseen reasons without worrying about penalties

content.title: Experiences suppliers love to talk about1

Howitworks.title: List Products
Howitworks.discription: List the products you want to sell in your supplier panel.

Howitworks.title: Get Orders
Howitworks.discription: Start getting orders from crores of indians actively shopping on our platform.

Howitworks.title: Lowest Cost Shipping
Howitworks.discription: Products are shipped to customers at lowest costs.

Howitworks.title: Receive Payments
Howitworks.discription: Payments are deposited directly to your bank account following a 7 day payment cycle from order delivery.

cardList.title: Lowest Shipping Costs
cardList.description: Sell your products across India to over 28000+pin codes at lowest delivery cost.

cardList.title: Ads to Grow More
cardList.description: Use pernia’s selling tools like ads to be more visible and sell more proucts.

cardList.title: Next Day Dispatch Program
cardList.description: Sign up for the quick next day dispatch program and get higher visibility and your own account manager.

cardList.title: Business Insights
cardList.description: Use product & price recommendations so that you’re always on top of your business.
